powerBank.title: Biz bilan bog'laning
powerBank.paragr: Barcha zamonaviy mobil qurilmalar uchun javob beradi. Batareya quvvati ikkita telefonni to'liq zaryad qilish uchun etarli.
powerBank.yomkost-p: iPhone 14 pro x 1,5 marta quvvatlantirish uchun yetarli

otziv.title: Fikrlar
otziv.userSay1: Отлично, что у нас появилась такая система с арендой повербанков. Теперь не нужно всегда таскать зарядку с собой!
otziv.userSay2: Работает хорошо без проблем лично я доволен. Хорошая идея.
otziv.userSay3: Отлично всё работает, я доволен сервисом.
otziv.userSay4: Judayam zor zatyadka, prilojeniya orqali qata borligini bilsila boladi. Eng zor tavsiya qilaman
otziv.userSay5: Zor iwlavoti molodest yoou uzb. da nomer1

partners.title: Biz bilan pul ishlang!
partners.rightP1: Stansiyani bepul yetkazib beramiz, foydalanish uchun mijoz o‘zi to‘laydi.
partners.rightP2: Siz stantsiya ijarasini to'laysiz, mijoz bepul to'lov oladi.

aplication.title: So'rov qoldiring va biz qo'ng'iroq qilamiz
aplication.name: Name

whoWe.company-p: We are a young company that has become the first hourly rental service for power banks (Power Bank) in Uzbekistan. The company was founded in 2020, and the first launch of the Service was held in 2021. In two years, we have gone through a thorny path of trial and error, which has now resulted in a constant stream of new users. We hope that we will continue to delight you with our service.
whoWe.founder1: Dilshod Bobomuradov - Co-founder, CEO, graduated from the Tashkent Financial Institute, 12 years in the manufacturing sector.
whoWe.founder2: Gordy Wu, WU ZHIXIANG - Co-founder, angel investor, graduated from Peking University, China. 10 years in the manufacturing industry. 5 years in the investment field.

collapse.answer1: 3,000 soums per hour, after 3 hours 10,000 per day. Round up to the hour. The first 1 minute is free to check the bank.
collapse.answer2:
Scan the QR code at the station or go to the AppStore or GooglePlay. Just search for “Yoou” and download the app 
• Register with your number and link the card. No pledges! 
• Отсscan the QR code at the station and take the power bank. 
• Bring back the bank. Rent is paid only after the return! 
• You can return the power bank to the station closest to you - you will find it on the map in the application. See how many slots there are for the return.
collapse.question3: How to return the power bank?
collapse.answer3:
Find a station with a free slot in the app - we'll show you the closest one on the map. 
• Insert the power bank into the slot of the working station, press it a little and wait a couple of seconds. The light will turn on, check your rental in the app. 
• If the time has not run out, call us at +998991970404, we will try to quickly resolve your issue and return the overcharged funds.
collapse.question4: How to find out if there are power banks or free space?
collapse.answer4: Click on a point on the map in the application. In the lower left corner it is written how many power banks are ready for rent, and how much space to return.
collapse.answer5: Type-C, micro-USB, Lightning for iPhone. Connect any cable of your choice - they are built into the power bank.
collapse.question6: How secure is a power bank??
collapse.answer6: Completely safe - just like a regular charger. Our power banks are produced in compliance with all international standards and with full certification.
collapse.question7: All the slots in the machine are full, and I can't turn over the bank. What to do?
collapse.answer7:
• Most importantly, don't leave your power bank to other people - even if it's a waiter. The power bank must be returned by the same person who rented it. 
• Look at the map of charging stations in the application - there you will find the nearest place where you can eat free space. Or call us at +998991970404.
collapse.answer8: Call us at the call center at +998991970404 and we will try to help you promptly.

footer.title: YOOU Share presents the service “Yoou Share” - hourly rental of Power Bank in Uzbekistan
